Title: The Maestro
Plot: George is feeling the pressures of his relationship with Susan and decides that he needs to help a security guard that works at her uncle's store. Kramer's friend "Maestro," makes a comment about getting a rental property in Tuscany that makes Jerry decide to do some research. Elaine begins dating the "Maestro." Kramer's out of court settlement in his lawsuit against the coffee house, free coffee at any location around the world, gets him "hopped up on the caffeine." Jerry asks Poppy about Tusca
GuestStars: Heidi Swedberg, Phil Morris, Mark Metcalf, Gary Yates, Paul Michael, James Noah, Tim Bagley, Richard McGonagle, Kenneth Ryan, Kymberly Newberry, David Wendelman
